projectsName.name: College Management System
projectsName.desc: This is a cloud based educational ERP software that enables HEIs to manage online admission & fees, students' attendance, library books, etc. It can also generate students' performance reports & simplify the hassles of faculty.

projectsName.name: Document Manager
projectsName.desc: This product will be used to store, share, track and manage files or documents. Some systems include history tracking where a log of the various versions created and modified by different users is recorded.

projectsName.name: Discover Law
projectsName.desc: Discover Law is a leading business law firm serving public, private and not-for-profit clients across key industries in Canada, the United States and internationally.

projectsName.name: Sports Stop
projectsName.desc: The Sports Stop delivers powerful stories and smart analysis that bring sports fans closer to the heart of the game. From breaking news and live commentary.

projectsName.name: Student Management System
projectsName.desc: A student management system (also known as a student information system or SIS) helps a school manage data, communications, and scheduling. A school system generates and uses a large amount of data. This data must be communicated appropriately to students, faculty, and parents.

projectsName.name: PEWA
projectsName.desc: PEWA is an abbreviation of Project Estimation and Work Allocation. It is an online tool for Project Management. It combines all the features that are required to manage a project.
